page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: With the post-war growth of the town, the number of schools has increased dramatically. New purpose-built primary schools have been built to serve the modern housing estates. There are two Infant schools,two Junior schools and the rest(5) are full Primary schools.One Infant and one Junior are C of E Church Aided and one Primary is Catholic controlled.The primary schools feed into two Comprehensives. The National(C of E Church Aided) has approx 900 pupils and the Holgate School has approx 1850 pupils. All schools offer a broad curriculum with many out of school activities. There is also a Further Education centre which offers vocational courses for over-16's.
